sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import moment from 'moment' const TransactionTable = ({ details, name, monthly, Date, text }) => { return (
{monthly ? : null} {details.map((result) => { return ( <> {monthly? :null} ) })}
{name} From {name} Amount {Date} Options
{result.text} {result.amount} {moment(result.createdAt).format('lll')} bu
) } export default TransactionTable
